title: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: A healthy salad packed with grilled chicken and fresh vegetables, perfect for a high-protein, low-carb meal.
instructions: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked and slice into strips.
In a large bowl, mix lettuce, cucumber, and cherry tomatoes.
Add grilled chicken on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Toss and serve immediately.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Creamy avocado on toasted whole grain bread. A great way to start your day with fiber and healthy fats.
ingredients: Salt and chili flakes to taste
instructions: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and chili flakes.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toast.
Serve immediately.

title: Veggie Stir Fry
description: A colorful mix of vegetables sautéed in light soy sauce. Vegan, low-fat, and full of flavor.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger for 1 minute.
Add all vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with or without rice.

title: Quinoa Salad
description: A light and nutritious quinoa salad loaded with fiber and fresh vegetables.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, and parsley.
Add olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.
Toss everything together and serve chilled.

title: Fruit Smoothie
description: A refreshing fruit smoothie rich in vitamins and antioxidants.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Delicious grilled salmon rich in omega-3 fatty acids and protein. Perfect for muscle recovery.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and herbs of your choice
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and herbs.
Grill skin-side down for 5-6 minutes, then flip and grill 3-4 minutes more.
Serve with steamed vegetables or a salad.
